text:
If you cant name five AI besides ChatGPT, save this.

Staying on top of AI = Staying on top of tools.



PS: to start with AI, check https://lnkd.in/d2BQW-w6.

✦ canva.com to design.
✦ gamma.app for slides.
✦ perplexity.ai to search.
✦ easygen.io for Linkedin.
✦ opus.pro to edit videos.
✦ grok.com for viral tweets.
✦ chat.com for 'everything'.
✦ claude.ai to write anything.
✦ blink.new to copy websites.

What am I missing? Leave a comment & I'll test it.
